original_title: Reel Herstory: The Real Story of Reel Women
overview: Using rare footage and exclusive interviews with filmmakers from all over the globe, "Reel Herstory" corrects the historic notion that women behind the scenes in motion pictures held peripheral careers compared with their male counterparts.
tagline: Who Knew She Saw So Much?
title: Reel Herstory: The Real Story of Reel Women
